ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, I seem to recall Shada saying he'd never get past level 54, then 55,
then never get past 56. . .


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
60 Bard, Erollisi Marr
Loving his Singing Short Sword despite all the complaints :)
